channel.title: fitness on Imaculate's Internet home
channel.description: Recent content in fitness on Imaculate's Internet home

item.title: Fittest
item.description: Photo by Geranimo on Unsplash A lot of wake up calls happen at the doctor’s offce. All too often we hear about how bad news changed the trajectory of one’s life: death, terminal illness, cautionary test results you name it. This call is ussually followed by a resolve to live healthier lives, likely active but definitely fuller lives. I recently had one such call, except my doctor didn’t deliver bad news, nor did they bring particularly good news, they simply confirmed that everything was fine, there was nothing wrong in any of the standard annual exams.

item.title: 2020 Wrapped
item.description: My, what a year! For the first time I’m looking back at a year ago and I feel … different, some degree stronger, some degree wiser, a lot more focused, and ofcourse very different. While the global review of 2020 deserves a series of encyclopedias, this post is about my personal review. Work Â¶ I switched to a new team at Microsoft in the first week of March; the very definition of bad timing.
